bach.SeriesJson#

class bach.SeriesJson(engine, base_node, index, name, expression, group_by, sorted_ascending, index_sorting)[source]#

A Series that represents the json type.

When json data is encountered in a sql table, this dtype is used. In the underlying sql, the data is cast to the jsonb type. As a result all methods of the SeriesJsonb can also be used with this json type series.
